company: IRIT (Toulouse Research Institute for Computer Science)
description: Full-stack development of KDo (Konsolidation Dashboards), a web-based dashboard application in the context of research in Technology-Enhanced Learning, as a member of the TALENT team of the IRIT laboratory.

This application aims to study how digital technology and GenAI can support teachers' involvement in regulating their students' out-of-class work.

• Participated in the UI/UX design of the analytics dashboards
• Developed the first screens to analyze students' revision work
• Added learning tracks to the existing revision application, providing useful data for researchers
